name: Boo! (a factory balls halloween)
description:
'Boo!' is a spooky puzzle game for you!

My spooky puzzler for the first time in its full form on Steam!
To solve the puzzles in "Boo!" you have to dip the pumpkin in the different paints and wear attributes to mask certain parts of the pumpkin.
The puzzles start easy but it gets more difficult!
Can you make the correct pumpkin in 42 Halloween themed levels?
Complete all the levels to unlock the daily puzzle mode!

Happy Halloween,
Bart Bonte
